name: Hey Clark... [VERY SHORT DEMO]
description:
Hey Clark... In this game demo you must figure out how things work. Its kind of  like puzzles in a demo horror game. This project is a prototype which is why it is marked as a demo. I'm also not ready to release the full game. I AM taking suggestions for the full game so if you add me on discord, (my username is Vortex#2563 btw) You  can suggest ideas or you can commission, you can also just talk to me. I know not a lot of people play my games but if you're reading this, you're a legend. Bye Clark...

If there are any problems with the ending, restart the game and it should be good but it usually doesn't do anything wrong.

Controls:

A: Left Of The Room

S: Middle Of The Room

D: Right Of The Room

PLEASE Post Lore!
